selections.name: My Tea
selections.reason: Consistent performer who finished a narrow 2nd at Albany last start over 1600m. Drawn well and looks the one to beat in this maiden field.

selections.name: Pure Mac
selections.reason: Drops in class from Ascot where he finished 4th. The step up in distance should suit and brings strong metropolitan form lines.

selections.name: Carentan
selections.reason: Showed improvement to finish 4th at this track last start. Drawn ideally in barrier 2 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Choice Attraction
selections.reason: Has been around the mark and could improve here, though the wide barrier makes it a bit tougher.

danger_horse.name: Pure Mac
danger_horse.reason: Metropolitan form is often superior in these provincial maidens; major threat if he handles the travel.

selections.name: Unfortunate Lad
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd at Albany. Racing well and looks ready to break through.

selections.name: Leafice
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at this track last start. Consistent type who should be right in the finish again.

selections.name: Cassenite
selections.reason: Finished 4th at Albany last start. Has shown enough ability to be competitive here despite the draw.

selections.name: Mr Frodo
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Trialled recently and could run a race fresh, though the wide gate is a concern.

danger_horse.name: Leafice
danger_horse.reason: Proven at the track and distance recently, will be hitting the line hard.

selections.name: Desert Waves
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd at Pinjarra last start. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2 and Pike rides. The one to beat.

selections.name: Can't Catch Me
selections.reason: Also coming off a 2nd place finish at Pinjarra. Drawn the inside rail and will be prominent throughout.

selections.name: Maythisbetheone
selections.reason: Runner-up at this track last start. Consistent form but has to overcome a tricky gate.

selections.name: Dark Opal
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten 2nd at this track last time out. Must be respected on that effort.

danger_horse.name: Can't Catch Me
danger_horse.reason: Speedy type from the inside draw who could lead all the way.

selections.name: Wahoochino
selections.reason: Beaten a nose at this track and distance last start. Drawn barrier 1 and looks primed to win.

selections.name: Eightyseven Lad
selections.reason: Solid 2nd at Pinjarra last outing. Pike takes the ride which is a huge positive.

selections.name: La Nocciola
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind Wahoochino last start. Meets that rival again and should be competitive.

selections.name: Playing Free
selections.reason: Drops from Ascot company. Form there was fair but this is easier.

danger_horse.name: Eightyseven Lad
danger_horse.reason: Pike/Pearce combination is lethal; major danger to the top pick.

selections.name: Magic Carats
selections.reason: Consistent performer with a good 2nd at this track last start. Drawn the rail and looks the testing material.

selections.name: Safedeel
selections.reason: Finished 3rd in the same race as Magic Carats. Should be right there again.

selections.name: Extreme Ruler
selections.reason: Experienced campaigner who is usually around the mark. Place chance.

selections.name: Secretchino
selections.reason: Was 8th last start but at big odds. Can improve here.

danger_horse.name: Safedeel
danger_horse.reason: Improving type who is getting closer to a win.

selections.name: Diamond Choux
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at Pinjarra last start. Pike rides and looks well placed in this field.

selections.name: Luna Ascending
selections.reason: Not far away when 5th at this track last start. Can figure in the finish.

selections.name: Hope To Admire
selections.reason: Drops in class from Ascot. Form has been mixed but this is easier.

selections.name: Jesa Lupa
selections.reason: Finished 5th at Pinjarra. Has place claims in an open race.

danger_horse.name: Luna Ascending
danger_horse.reason: Consistent enough to threaten in a race lacking depth.

selections.name: Snip Of Gossip
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd at Ascot last start. Brings superior form to this race and looks hard to beat despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Buster Biff
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. In winning form and drawn well.

selections.name: Wayne The Pain
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at this track last outing. Consistent and should be in the mix.

selections.name: Miss Wall Street
selections.reason: Class runner of the field but has a horror draw to overcome.

danger_horse.name: Buster Biff
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form; proven at the track.

selections.name: Sentimental Legend
selections.reason: Won well on debut at this track. Looks to have plenty of upside and Pike sticks.

selections.name: Aurora Queen
selections.reason: Finished 3rd at this track last start. Consistent type who will be running on.

selections.name: O'so Demanding
selections.reason: Also finished 3rd at this track recently. Racing well and has claims.

selections.name: Icandoit Onmyown
selections.reason: Finished 3rd in a similar race last start. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Aurora Queen
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and hits the line hard; dangerous if the pace is hot.
